title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single command.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—browser & Node.js support, promise-based.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: chatbox-ai
summary: Cross-platform desktop client (Electron) supporting Ollama, OpenAI, Claude; open-source.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced interactive CLI wrapper around ollama with history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like pair programmer.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for chatting and generating with Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java / Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama (targets .NET 6+) with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-to-run docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open WebUI, GPU or CPU only.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that calls Ollama for local AI-assisted note writing & summarization.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin integrating Ollama for on-device AI block generation and summarization.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama responses in chat threads.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app bringing Ollama LLM into channels/DMs with configurable system prompts.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package providing JS/TS bindings to the Ollama REST API.
